TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中所有项的聚合。The class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. 类包含零个或多个 对象。The class contains zero or more objects. 其中每个列表都包含零个或多个对象，这些对象表示面板中的实际项并且派生自 类。Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the class. 下表显示了提供的两种方法 ，用于使用组件（包括自定义控件）的项填充面板。The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls. |方法Technique|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |拉取模型Pull model|组件类的设计器（派生自 类）通过属性提供此集合 。The designer for the component class, which is derived from the class, supplies this collection through the property. 设计器基础结构在必须显示面板时读取此属性。The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |推送模型Push model|在对 与组件关联的的方法的调用中，将或作为参数提供 。A or is supplied as a parameter in a call to the method of the associated with the component.| 设计器基础结构通过创建智能标记面板来构造面板，其构造函数采用两个类型的参数 。The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type . 包含拉取和推送项的列表集合合并为一个面板。The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel. 由于它是从类派生的 ，因此 使用内部 来存储其 对象集合。Because it derives from the class, uses an internal to store its collection of objects. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象的集合 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [如何：将智能标记附加到 Windows 窗体组件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120))。For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120)). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/CS/designeractions.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/VB/designeractions.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/CS/designeractions.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/VB/designeractions.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新元素将添加到内部列表的末尾。The new elements are added to the end of the internal list. 验证参数后 `value` ，该方法将对 方法进行一系列调用 以单独添加每个元素。After validating the `value` parameter, the method makes a series of calls to the method to individually add each element.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList[] array, int index);

Public Sub CopyTo (array As DesignerActionList(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignerActionList ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 类型的一维数组，它是从当前集合复制的元素的目标数组。

span.span: The one-dimensional array of type that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.

param.span: 该数组的索引必须从零开始。

span.span: The array must have zero-based indexing.

param.name: index
param.span: 中从零开始的索引，从此处开始复制。

span.span: The zero-based index in at which copying begins.

summary.span: 将当前集合的元素复制到提供的数组，从指定的数组索引开始。

span.span: Copies the elements of the current collection into the supplied array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在 复制时方法引发异常，则目标数组的状态为 undefined。If the method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined. 例如，如果 或 发生，则目标数组可能会处于部分填充状态。For example, if an or occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.

span.span: is .
is less than 0.
is multidimensional.
-or-

exception.span: 当前集合中的元素数目大于从 到目标数组的末尾的可用空间。

span.span: The number of elements in the current collection is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination array.

exception.span: 将当前集合的元素强制转换为目标数组的类型时发生问题，可能是由于失败的向下转换造成的。

span.span: A problem occurred casting the elements of the current collection to the type of the destination array, perhaps as the result of a failed downcast.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As DesignerActionList)

param.name: index
param.span: 应插入 的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入到集合中的 。

span.span: The to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 将提供的 插入到集合中的指定位置。

span.span: Inserts the supplied into the collection at the specified position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 参数等于属性的值 ，则会将新元素添加到集合的末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the property, the new element is added to the end of the collection. 类在内部 使用， 它包含对象的集合 。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由于列表维护连续元素，因此在插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 此重新排列将更改插入点后的元素的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于当前集合中的元素计数。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素设置为 `null` 会导致在显示智能标记面板时引发设计时异常。Setting an element to `null` causes a design-time exception to be thrown when the smart tag panel is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要从当前集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the current collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除特定 的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在内部 使用， 它包含对象的集合 。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由于列表保留了连续元素，因此删除点之后的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot. 此重新排列将更改删除点后的元素的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.
